Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Prepare audit program and audit schedule in advance each audit.
              
              - Report to management team the audit results and recommendations.
              
              - Follow up the corrective action taken and/or improvement plans from the suppliers.
              
              - Monitor supplier performance and continuously develop and improve their capabilities.
              
              - Supplier quality development (audit, sample & PPAP review,…)
              
              - Process/Product Quality Specification and Process/Product Verification & Improvement
              
              - New project verification

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Male ( 30-35 year olds)
              
              - University degree in Electrical/Mechanical major
              
              - 5 years experiences
              
              - Good English reading, writing & speaking
              
              - Experience in quality control & QMS
              
              - QMS internal auditor
              
              - Experience in 5 core tools (APQP, PPAP, FMEA, SPC & MSA)
              
              - Quality report, Quality tools, ISO 9001, IATF 16949…
              
              Benefits
              
              -	Attractive salary and bonus
              
              -	Normal working hours are between 7.30am and 4.30pm Monday to Friday. On the first Saturday of every month for our training activity and others (1 day per month only)
              
              -	Social, Health & unemployment Insurance
              
              -	Company trip, sport event, Charity event,….
              
              -	Gifts on holidays: 20/10, birthday, 30/4, Company day….
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
